recipe.title: Frozen Yogurt-covered Strawberries Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¾ cup ; plain greek yogurt, nonfat ; (213 g)
½ cup ; almond, roasted, unsalted, chopped ; (70 g)

steps.step: Combine Greek yogurt, honey, and water in a small bowl and stir to combine.
Dip the strawberries into the yogurt mixture, ensuring they are fully coated.
Dip the yogurt-covered strawberries in the chopped almonds, and place on a parchment paper-lined sheet tray.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Combine Greek yogurt, honey, and water in a small bowl and stir to combine.
Dip the strawberries into the yogurt mixture, ensuring they are fully coated.
Dip the yogurt-covered strawberries in the chopped almonds, and place on a parchment paper-lined sheet tray.
